entries.title: Elon Musk Delaying Twitter Blue Checkmark Launch, May Offer Different Colors for Organizations
entries.description: Twitter logo and a photo of Elon Musk are displayed through a magnifier in this illustration taken on Oct. 27, 2022. (Dado Ruvic/Reuters)

entries.title: TSMC Planning Advanced Chip Production in Arizona, Says Company’s Founder
entries.description: Taiwan's APEC representative and TSMC founder Morris Chang speaks at a news conference after his return to Taipei, Taiwan, on Nov. 21, 2022. (Ann Wang/Reuters)

entries.title: Tesla Safety at Center of South Korean Trial Over Fiery, Fatal Crash

entries.title: Children’s Privacy on Facebook Tightens
entries.description: A 3D-printed Facebook like button in front of the Facebook logo in an illustration taken on Oct. 25, 2017. (Dado Ruvic/Illustration/Reuters)
